front.title: Clarification of Privacy Mechanism for SIP

abstract.t: This document is an informational RFC to clarify the use of privacy mechanism for Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) that is specified in RFC 3323 and extended in subsequent RFCs, such as RFC 3325. It is intended to clarify the semantics of each privacy header value (priv-value) and the handling of the relevant target SIP headers for each of the priv-value. It also provides some guidelines on providing privacy considerations for future specifications that define SIP headers which may be influenced by the privacy mechanism.
